Your one-stop static site engine

Forget dependencies. Everything you need in one binary.

Get started

Everything built-in

Gutenberg comes with Sass compilation, syntax highlighting and other features that usually require using additional tools or use JavaScript libraries on your site.

Scalable

Gutenberg builds your site as static files: no need for a database or a server to manage. You won't run into any scaling issues.

Flexible & easy to use

From blogs to knowledge bases: anything can be built with Gutenberg. Gutenberg gets out of your way so you can focus on your content.

Fast

Your site — including Sass compilation and syntax highlighting — will be generated in milliseconds, not seconds.
